testcase.classname: When a user lands on the main page
testcase.name: Cookie notification on main page
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the main page.......................................passed Then Cookie pop up notification is shown....................................passed

testcase.classname: When a user enters an invalid email
testcase.name: Invalid email notification
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to the main page.......................................passed And User accepts cookie notification........................................passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed When User enters an invalid email...........................................passed Then A notification is shown displaying "Voer je volledige e-mailadres in. Bijvoorbeeld: naam@voorbeeld.com" and has "#db3734" hex color value.passed

testcase.classname: When the user navigates to the main page. The expected behavior is that the page shows all the available options
testcase.name: Valuta options
